content: Is there a way to get the forward/back mouse buttons to work in the Zulip desktop app? They work fine in the browser.

I don't think it supports it natively: https://github.com/zulip/zulip-desktop/issues/1015

I use the keyboard for back/forward (⌘ ← → ).

Depending on what OS, mouse, and software you have, you might be able to configure some kind of macro that would send the relevant keystrokes.
Huh, interesting Electron issue. VS Code supports it out of the box.
Vs code is the only electron app that I can open without crying immediately
Well, Slack too, but that’s because I’m too busy putting out the fires it causes in my computer
